title: Android app deals of the day: The Captain is Dead, Runic Curse, Heal Pocket Edition, more
content:
All of the best Android app discounts are now up for the taking alongside deals on Sony’s 4K OLED Xperia PRO 5G smartphone and Samsung’s ANC Galaxy Buds Pro. You’ll find even more in Android hub, but be sure to head back here for your software needs. Today’s collection includes The Captain is Dead, G’Luck!, Reminder Pro, Runic Curse, Heal: Pocket Edition, and more. Head below for today’s complete collection of Android app deals. 

more…
